name: A Fistful of Thyme
description:
made for Xanderjam 5: theme Time

  • WASD to move
  • P to attack
  • Space to sprint
  • Arrow keys to turn camera
  • Enter to skip cutscene and select menus

Known issues

  • HTML5 might be laggy.
  • No fullscreen. Zoom in on your browser.
  • Player don't take damage.
  • Ending and some effects are unfinished.
